summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3638 , for the improvement of 44th Avenue Southwest from West Edmunds Street to West Dakota Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete walks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44953, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
